author: donschoe
content: anyone else noticed increased github spam? https://github.com/goerli/medalla/pull/50

author: donschoe
content: I keep getting that across different organizations.

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!557201004060213248> Happens across all Ethereum related repositories.  I think it is scammers trying to build a GitHub profile that the laymen will glance at and think, "oh, this is a prolific Ethereum developer".

author: sky.cactus
content: I strongly recommend reporting them to GitHub.
